Reviews.Title: Truly Mobile!
Reviews.Author: Jon Padilla
Reviews.Content: Very capable device, the range of options, LAN, WiFi, to 3G makes this a must have for the IT Pro. The battery life is over 7 hours after a full charge. Very good product for the price.Real life recommended!Jon

Reviews.Title: great product to share internet at Home and on travel
Reviews.Author: Paul
Reviews.Content: I will now get a better signal and share across all my devices.I was recommended by a friend who bought a previous version and this one is so powerful.

Reviews.Title: Great tool!
Reviews.Author: Rogelio Guillermo Mellina
Reviews.Content: I've just used everywhere I've gone in South America and in Europe. When connecting to a LAN network the range is more than aceptable.

Reviews.Title: Great modem - does it's work just fine.
Reviews.Author: Tamar Gogia
Reviews.Content: It has very good coverage for such a small unit.Has no problem with different sim cards.Next few drawbacks are not so important to remove even star:Price - really not cheap.No AC charger included, while USB charge takes quite long time.Overall, I'm really satisfied from this device.

Reviews.Title: Good Product
Reviews.Author: Lawrence Yeung
Reviews.Content: It works nicely when I travel in Asia.However, its coverage in US is quite limited because of the restriction of US 3G provider. The product itself is very well design. Battery life is good too.

Reviews.Title: Bad internet signal in my country
Reviews.Author: Maria A. B. Bittencourt
Reviews.Content: I have owned mobile WiFi in Brazil, where I live, and since our internet reception is quite bad, this mobile one let's me roam around and find the best spot. Most of Huawei products are excellent.

Reviews.Title: Feedback for product manager
Reviews.Author: J. Loop
Reviews.Content: So far so good.The power button can easily be inadvertently turned on.It was not obvious the pass code to bind wifi was on the inside back cover that removes to install battery. The manual had a drawing of it but even this wasn't clear.I figured it out ... But it took a while.Other than these nits, great so far. Luv that I can connect to Ethernet the broadcast wifi to a bunch of devices. Thank you.

Reviews.Title: Beautiful and easy
Reviews.Author: Pierrevp
Reviews.Content: Everyone comments on it's stylish looks. It's also very easy to configure and use. The included android app doesn't allow you to send text messages though, so on android you'd need to connect using a web browser if you want to send a activation sms.

Reviews.Title: Does not mention that you MUST buy a data plan
Reviews.Author: JM "Jason"
Reviews.Content: The device is cool; fine.  You must go to AT&T; or Verizon or TMobile and purchase a SIM card and a monthly service plan of about $50/5Gb of data per month.They should mention this SOMEWHERE in the description for folks not familiar with Mobile Hot-Spot functionality like me.  Returning it... Since I'm not paying $50/month.

Reviews.Title: Okay so far.
Reviews.Author: Tracy Cooperrider
Reviews.Content: Seems to work fine in current country. Trying it out in new locale this week. Still haven't figured out how to connect to other wifi without a chip. Or if it's even capable of doing it....  Reading the manual again.
